thread.title: Thomas Coward
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by Thomas Coward

author: Thomas Coward
title: Thomas Coward
text:
I've been using Blumberg for Will kits, corporate sets, and notary supplies for many years. I find the quality of the products to be very high for the price. The online catalogue describes the products very accurately, and I have never been surprised by the appearance of the items when received. Most items ship within a day or two, and arrive promptly. On the occasions when they have a question, they communicate promptly.
I continue to be pleased and impressed.
